name: AskSonic
description: AskSonic is an Alexa skill to play music from Subsonic API compatible music servers.

ASKS_SUBSONIC_URL.description: The base URL of your Subsonic-compatible music server. (Must be https)

ASKS_SUBSONIC_PORT.description: [Optional] The port your Subsonic server listens on

ASKS_ROUTE_PREFIX.description: [Optional] The endpoint that Alexa will use to communicate with AskSonic
